column4: hey anyone im trying to get files from a samba mounted directory through ftp, and the thing is I can cd nicely through the mounted directory tree nicely, and can even place files from them, when reading the permissions on any of the files, i am owner, yet when attempting to mget the file it tells me that permission is denied ?
i have a+rwx on all files within the mount
and can mget correctly from anywhere but the mount
you have to have permission in ftp to mget the files as well....owning them is not enough
